name: Rhythmic Synchrony
description: A delicately shaped tambourine model with sea-blue graffiti on the body of the drum, the same shape as those commonly found in the People of the Springs. Highly portable, this drum can be mastered swiftly, even by beginners. Its light and lively tune makes it perfect for keeping rhythm during a chorus, and as such, it evolved into a musical symbol of joyful gatherings...
